item.title: Temporary lights phasing wrong - causing mayhem, 1st January
item.description:
There are gas or electric works at the junction of dunton and lynton Road where the lights are phased so badly people are going through red lights and it’s causing major safety concerns for pedestrians and motorists not to mention the constant horns being used which is terrible for the local resident. Please sort it out asap!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dunton Road, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
